description:
Kent is a cute, lean young dude who is "open" sexually but prefers girls. He likes anal sex and is interested in doing video to pick up some extra cash.

Kent was really quiet when I first hooked up with him, but after chatting for a while he opened up and shared a few things with me. He's working construction right now, he has a girlfriend (who doesn't know he's doing this... so shhh), and he's hoping to start school in the fall.

Unfortunately, when I turned the camera on he clammed back up. Oh well, did I mention he's cute?
title: Kent
